{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3580355,"name":"Mehmet Eren KIRKAŞ","username":"merenkirkas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/merenkirkas/{size}/254837_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-04T21:01:54.399Z","cooked":"

Greetings, in order to make our robot more stable alignments in the off season, we want to create 6 regions on the half field we are in and find a path to the reef alignment in that region and we want the robot to move. Is there a resource you can recommend us about this zoning? Also an extra advice you can give about this subject?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2025-04-04T21:01:54.399Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":7,"reads":331,"readers_count":330,"score":101.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":498029,"topic_slug":"dividing-the-field-into-zones","display_username":"Mehmet Eren KIRKAŞ","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66157,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"merenkirkas"},"post_url":"/t/dividing-the-field-into-zones/498029/1","custom_user_title":"merenkirkas","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3580395,"name":"Cole Hunt","username":"crh_redbird1","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/crh_redbird1/{size}/237120_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-04T21:51:58.903Z","cooked":"

We implemented a similar approach to this and it has been working great. We use it for all our automation.
Strategies for Target Designation - #30 by crh_redbird1.

These are all the zones we made.

image1170×565 118 KB

image1170×555 80 KB

After champs I can link our public repo to show how we implemented it. (If I remember….)

We added the ability to make circular zones that was unique to our implementation.
